QuestData.Title: Something's Not Quite Right...
QuestData.Description: Something is troubling me, champion.$b$bBeyond these simple japes, the Kirin Tor has had to break up a few fights between the elves. I am worried something - or someone - might be influencing them.$b$bYour disguise was made by the nightborne, yes? It is not unreasonable to assume they can do something similar.$b$bFortunately, Thalyssra has told me much about how the illusion works, and I believe this crystal can remove their disguise.$b$bWhy don't you check the camps, just to be safe?
QuestData.AreaDescription: Remove the disguise of 5 Nightborne Infiltrators.
QuestData.LogDescription: Remove the disguise of 5 Nightborne Infiltrators.
QuestData.RewardText: It is as I feared. Hopefully they will think twice before sending more spies.
